headline: Is Charter Communications Stock Mispriced After a 44% Slide and Heavy Broadband Investment?
summary: Wondering if Charter Communications at around $204 a share is a bargain or a value trap? This deep dive will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The share price has bounced about 3.9% over the last week after a rough stretch, with 1 year returns down about 44.1% and 5 year returns off roughly 68.5%. That naturally raises the question of whether pessimism has gone too far. Recent headlines have focused on Charter's continued heavy investment in broadband...

headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Down 41% Year-to-Date, Here’s What You Need To Know
summary: ​Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the Cheap NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Now. On December 2, Keith Snyder CFA from CFRA downgraded Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) from Hold to Sell and lowered the price target from $285 to $165. Earlier on November 4, Timothy Horan from Oppenheimer also downgraded the stock from Buy to […]
